scenario_text.value:
Ah, I guess I should say thanks for the
advice instead?
So did you make up with Labramon?

We did! It’s like nothing happened in the
first place.

All the more reason I’m worried about the
others now.

My words got stuck in my throat, and
I couldn’t help mediate the situation...

But from now on, I’ll try to stop any fights
that start in front of me.

As long you don’t overdo it, then by all
means. I’ll be there to help, too.

Hehe... Oh right, I meant to give this to
you.
I found it while I was looking for Falcomon.

Aoi here found it, not me. No mean feat,
don’t you think?

You’re right about that. I’ll put it to good
use.

My gratitude toward Labramon is practically
bottomless.

That’s why I’d like to help Minoru make up
with Falcomon as soon as he can.
